sorcer.provider.boot

Class SorcerDescriptorUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • sorcer.provider.boot.SorcerDescriptorUtil

  • public class SorcerDescriptorUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Holds static attributes used during the startup of services and provides utilities to obtain ServiceDescriptor instances for SORCER services

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructor and Description

    • Method Detail

      • getWebster

        public static com.sun.jini.start.ServiceDescriptor getWebster(java.lang.String policy,
                                                              java.lang.String[] roots)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using an anonymous port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/common/sorcer/webster.com
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not setValue

      • getWebster

        public static com.sun.jini.start.ServiceDescriptor getWebster(java.lang.String policy,
                                                              int port,
                                                              java.lang.String[] roots)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        port - The port webster should use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using a specified port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/common/sorcer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not setValue

      • getWebster

        public static com.sun.jini.start.ServiceDescriptor getWebster(java.lang.String policy,
                                                              int port,
                                                              java.lang.String[] roots,
                                                              java.lang.String address,
                                                              boolean debug,
                                                              boolean isDaemon)
                                                       throws java.io.IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for Webster.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        port - The port webster should use
        roots - The roots webster should serve
        debug - If true, setValue the sorcer.tools.debug property
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for webster using a specified port. The webster.jar file will be loaded from ${sorcer.home}/common/sorcer
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port

      • getProvider

        public static com.sun.jini.start.ServiceDescriptor getProvider(java.lang.String policy,
                                                               java.lang.String... jobberConfig)
                                                        throws java.io.IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for ServiceJobber using the Webster port created by this utility.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        monitorConfig - The configuration options the Monitor will use
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for the Monitor using an anonymous port. The monitor.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/lib
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not setValue

      • getDatabaseStorer

        public static com.sun.jini.start.ServiceDescriptor getDatabaseStorer(java.lang.String policy,
                                                                     java.lang.String... sdbConfig)
                                                              throws java.io.IOException
        Get the ServiceDescriptor instance for DatabaseStorer using the Webster port created by this utility.
        Parameters:
        policy - The security policy file to use
        exertmonitorConfig - The configuration options the DatabaseStore will use
        Returns:
        The ServiceDescriptor instance for the Monitor using an anonymous port. The sdb-prv.jar file will be loaded from sorcer.home/lib
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If there are problems getting the anonymous port
        java.lang.RuntimeException - If the sorcer.home system property is not setValue

      • concat

        public static java.lang.String concat(java.lang.Object[] objects,
                                      char separator)
        Concatenate the strings resulting from calling String.valueOf(Object) on each element of an array of objects with a follow up separator. Passing a zero length array will result in the empty string being returned.
        Parameters:
        objects - the array of objects to be processed.
        objects - a character separator.
        Returns:
        the concatenation of the return values from calling String.valueOf on each element of objects.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NullPointerException - if objects is null.

      • getHomeDir

        Returns the home directory of the iGrid environment.
        Returns:
        a path of the home directory

      • find

        public static java.io.File find(java.io.File dir,
                                java.lang.String baseName)
        Find a file starting with the baseName.
        Parameters:
        dir - The directory the file is located in.
        baseName - The name the sought after file starts with.
        Returns:
        The File or null
        Throws:
        java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if either argument is null
